-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Optimal variable selection in chain graphical model.
--   
--   An implementation of the VOIDP algorithm that selects the optimal
--   observations in chain graphical models.
--   
--   References:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>Andreas Krause and Carlos Guestrin. 2009. Optimal value of
--   information in graphical models. J. Artif. Int. Res. 35, 1 (July
--   2009), 557-591.</li>
--   <li>Qi Qi; Yi Shang; Hongchi Shi; , <a>An improved algorithm for
--   optimal subset selection in chain graphical models,</a> Evolutionary
--   Computation (CEC), 2010 IEEE Congress on , vol., no., pp.1-6, 18-23
--   July 2010</li>
--   </ul>
@package hVOIDP
@version 1.0.2

module Table
data Table a b
newTable :: Ix b => [(b, a)] -> Table a b
findTable :: Ix b => Table a b -> b -> a
updTable :: Ix b => (b, a) -> Table a b -> Table a b
instance (Show a, Show b, Ix b) => Show (Table a b)

module Dynamic
dynamic :: Ix coord => (Table entry coord -> coord -> entry) -> (coord, coord) -> (Table entry coord)
